title: Capital Companion
description:
Capital Companion: Your 24/7 AI trading assistant. Gain a competitive edge in the markets with AI-driven insights and recommendations. Features:

- Real-time stock analytics
- Advanced risk management tools
- Sentiment analysis from social media and news
- Trendline detection and pattern recognition
- AI-powered trading suggestions

Let the AI companion support your trading journey with cutting-edge algorithms and up-to-the-minute data analysis to help reduce seat time.
